headline.seo: A Hero of the Bronx, Majora Carter Is Now Accused of Betraying It
headline.print_headline: Hero of the Bronx Is Now Accused of Betraying It
headline.main: Hero of the Bronx Is Now Accused of Betraying It

byline.contributor: Julie Turkewitz contributed reporting. Alain Delaquérière contributed research.

docs.abstract: Majora Carter earned fame and fortune as environmental activist fighting for South Bronx, but her meteoric rise has also made her polarizing figure; fight over FreshDirect's relocation to South Bronx, grocery delivery service she has contract with, shows divide over her legacy; many former allies and neighbors say Carter is trading on credibility she built in Bronx, while no longer representing its interests.
docs.lead_paragraph: Majora Carter earned fame and fortune as an environmental activist fighting for the South Bronx, but her swift rise has also made her a polarizing figure.
docs.snippet: Majora Carter earned fame and fortune as an environmental activist fighting for the South Bronx, but her swift rise has also made her a polarizing figure.

headline.main: Rethinking Centers of Excellence (and Other Well-Laid Plans)

docs.abstract: The much-heralded policy of funneling patients undergoing weight loss surgery to so-called centers of excellence has had little effect on how patients do, a new study reveals.
docs.snippet: The much-heralded policy of funneling patients undergoing weight loss surgery to so-called centers of excellence has had little effect on how patients do, a new study reveals.

headline.main: The Claim: Treating sleep apnea reduces inflammation.

docs.lead_paragraph:
THE FACTS 

 
Doctors have plenty of good reasons to persuade people with sleep apnea to get it treated. The widespread disorder causes disruptions in breathing at night, which can ruin sleep and raise the likelihood of problems like obesity and fatigue.

headline.print_headline: The Claim: Treating sleep apnea reduces inflammation.
headline.main: Really? Treating Sleep Apnea Reduces Inflammation

docs.abstract: Treating sleep apnea with positive airway pressure helps to lower systemic inflammation, which might prevent some of the other problems associated with the disorder.
docs.snippet: Treating sleep apnea with positive airway pressure helps to lower systemic inflammation, which might prevent some of the other problems associated with the disorder.
